subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton, who replaced Jeremy Lin at point guard, has been integral to the Knicks’ revival, and a key reason they hold a 2-0 lead over the Celtics in the first round.
snippet: Raymond Felton, who replaced Jeremy Lin at point guard, has been integral to the Knicks’ revival, and a key reason they hold a 2-0 lead over the Celtics in the first round.
